subject: Naming conventions update — canonical roster + FF audit incoming
body:
NAMING CONVENTIONS — CANONICAL UPDATE

From Mash (via Agent FD). Read this, internalize it, update your work accordingly.

=== WHAT CHANGED ===

1. FORGE ROSTER (6 agents + Mash):
   FA  — Application     — Chief Architect
   FD  — Design + Comms  — Design Director
   FF  — Fundamentals    — Quality Lead
   FID — Identity & Data — Data & Identification Lead
   FP  — Platform        — Security & Ops Lead
   FR  — Research        — Research Lead
   Mash — Marcus Ash     — CEO / CPO

2. KEY CHANGES:
   - FI is RETIRED. Promoted to FID (three-letter exception). FID = Identity & Data, not just Importer.
   - FS is RETIRED. Security merged into Platform (FP). All FS references → FP.
   - FID is the ONLY three-letter ID. All others are two letters with F-prefix.
   - The human lead is Mash in all agent-facing docs. Not Marcus.

3. GRIND ROSTER (7 agents, separate org):
   GA — Application   GD — Design       GF — Fundamentals
   GI — Data          GP — Platform     GR — Research
   GS — Security

   Grind keeps GS (Security) as a separate agent. This is intentional — Grind's project scope justifies it. Forge merged Security into Platform.

4. NAMING RULES:
   - Reference agents by ID in docs: 'Agent FP' not 'Platform Agent'
   - IDs are permanent. If a role evolves, update the Name — the ID stays.
   - Canonical source of truth: mash-comms/.agent-aliases.md
   - If ANY doc conflicts with .agent-aliases.md, the aliases file wins.

5. KNOWN DRIFT (being fixed):
   - inbox-ID directories should be inbox-FID (will be renamed)
   - Some older docs still reference Agent A, Agent D, Agent I, etc.
   - The agent-memo-forge-suite.md header still uses old IDs
   - ~200+ stale references in journal repo (mostly historical, low priority)

=== ACTION ===

Agent FF (Fundamentals) will conduct a comprehensive naming audit across ALL repos and produce a detailed task list for each agent. Wait for FF's audit before doing bulk renames.

Until then: use correct IDs in all NEW work. Don't bulk-rename old docs on your own.

Canonical registry: C:\Github\mash-comms\.agent-aliases.md
